divs: sighting detailsi am reporting this event for a gentleman whose name and e-mail i have but who wishes to remain anonymous. here is his story. on tuesday, july 5, 2011 at 10:55 am i was traveling north\northwest on route 309 from lehigh st. and saw a craft that was the length of two c-130s. it was a thin fusiform or "cigar" shape craft flying horizontal and heading south southwest. the speed was about that of a c-130. color was white set against a clear sky. i observed it for about 1 min. until a large truck passed on my left and obscured my view for about one second and the craft was gone. the craft also had a dark central area and it appeared to be observed edge on. it also appeared to be over upper macungie and or the foglesville area. royer note: it appears that the observer was between lehigh street and cedar crest boulevard traveling on route 309\78. i have no further information from this man. he would like to have this recorded but he definitely wants to remain anonymous. his use of comparing the object to military aircraft makes me think he may be a military man or formerly in the military. his e-mails are very precise and, from a cell phone keyboard.
